an4.220:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.220:1.3: Assaddho hoti, dussilo hoti, kusito hoti, duppanno hoti—
an4.220:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.220:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an4.220:2.3: Saddho hoti, silava hoti, araddhaviriyo hoti, pannava hoti—
an4.220:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
